alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL LINCOLN, EAST CENTRAL SOCORRO AND SOUTH CENTRAL TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Claunch, or 15 miles west of Corona, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Lincoln, east central Socorro and south central Torrance Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; South Central Highlands
